src/models/metrics.py.description: CostForecast model added for 7-day cost forecasting. Uses JSONB for hourly_prices (168 hours), daily_costs, confidence_intervals, and usage_pattern. Includes best_window_* fields for optimal timing recommendations.

src/services/price_prediction_service.py.description: Added calculate_mape method for computing MAPE, MAE, RMSE, R² accuracy metrics comparing predictions with actual MarketSnapshot data. Also added get_accuracy_history for querying historical accuracy. PredictionAccuracy model stores these metrics with hourly/daily breakdowns.

src/api/v1/endpoints/spot/cost_forecast..description: Cost forecast endpoint created at GET /cost-forecast/{gpu_name}. Returns 7-day cost predictions with daily aggregations and confidence intervals. Uses PricePredictionService.forecast_costs_7day(). Query params: usage_hours_per_day (default 8), machine_type (default interruptible). Schema file at src/api/v1/schemas/spot/cost_forecast.py.
